title: How to Share Photobucket Pictures with Friends

steps.headline: Open an album where a photo or image is located.
Click on "Edit setting" button and change Privacy to 'Public'.

Click on the photo you want to share,{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/4\/41\/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/4\/41\/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}
Click on the "Share" button.
steps.description:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/5\/59\/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/5\/59\/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} It will open a new screen where you will see a few options for sharing.

steps.headline: Let us review a few options.
Post a photo to Facebook.
steps.description:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/3\/37\/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-7.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/3\/37\/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-7.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":347,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":572.8643216080402,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Click on the "Social Media" tab. Click on the "Facebook" button to log in. Click on the "Share" button. A photo (or image) will be posted on your Facebook wall. Be discreet when you post on Facebook, considering your settings - WHO is going to view your photo. You can view your post by clicking on "View post" button.

steps.headline: E-mail a photo.
steps.description:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/6\/6b\/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/6\/6b\/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":351,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":579.5,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Click the "E-mail" tab. Enter e-mail of a person to send to. Enter a subject. Enter a message if you desire. Click on "Send" button.

steps.headline: Post a photo on Forums, websites, Myspace
steps.description: Click on the "Get link code" tab. Depending where you want to post your photo out of the options. Select a link that applies to your option. Mark a box. Highlight a link fully. Click CTRL-C to copy to the clipboard. Click on "Save" button  to save  your selection for the future.

steps.headline: When you are done, click on "X" icon on the top to get out of the screen and return to the album.

E-mail a photo. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/6b/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/6b/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":351,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":579.5,"licensing":"

Post a photo on Forums, websites, Myspace Click on the "Get link code" tab. Depending where you want to post your photo out of the options. Select a link that applies to your option. Mark a box. Highlight a link fully. Click CTRL-C to copy to the clipboard. Click on "Save" button to save your selection for the future. When you are done, click on "X" icon on the top to get out of the screen and return to the album. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/59/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-10.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/59/Share-Photobucket-Pictures-with-Friends-Step-10.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"
